title: Milkshake Mix with Yummi Nuts
ingredients: 2 cups vanilla ice cream (or flavor of your choice).
1 cup mix of Yummi Nuts: Lemon Peanuts / Chile Toreado Peanuts / Salted Peanuts.
instructions: Step 1. Place all ingredients, except cinnamon, in a blender.
Step 2. Blend until smooth to form the milkshake.
Step 3. Serve in a glass and sprinkle with a bit of cinnamon.
